/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of motion and life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars can be seen driving on the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees, the blue of the sky, and the varied hues of the buildings creating a visually appealing palette.
